content: >i created this pattern to support the people of ukraine in my own small way if you like and enjoy this pattern and you are able to do so please consider supporting the people in ukraine in the way you feel most appropriate thank you finished size approximately 3 ½ tall **materials ** yarn any dk cotton weight yarn of your choice blue yellow brown & green i used paintbox yarn cotton dk- kingfisher blue mustard yellow coffee bean & grass green 2 75 hook c stitch marker stuffing poly pellets optional pipe cleaner optional tapestry needle this pattern design may not be distributed or sold as your own but feel free to sell a finished item and to share pattern freely
